description:
Kenny and Marcus were hanging out the other day, throwing the football around. After a bit of catch, the two headed over to the deck where they had the lawn chairs set up and a few cold brews waiting for them. When Kenny was coming back outside after taking a leak, he found Marcus with his pants down. Surprised, but not appalled, Kenny takes a seat next to his buddy and goes with the flow; dropping his drawers and yanking on his cock as well. The two sip their brews and jerk off until both of them drench themselves in their creamy white man milk. That's always fun!

Enjoy!
title: Kenny & Marcus
